description: Remia, nicknamed the "Mage of Falling Leaves", is an elite magician with such magical prowess that her name has echoed across the world. It is not an overstatement to consider her to be one of the best magicians in the entire world. At the present she makes her base in the woods, on the outskirts of the frontier town Azpire, where she can conduct her hobby of researching magic and the culinary arts while also instructing Muller.
name: Lemia
